title: Alquiler de ático en Santa Ponça
description:
Located in the prestigious El Mirador development in El Port Adriano Bay, this stunning top-floor apartment offers a rare opportunity to live in one of the most sought-after areas of Mallorca. With breathtaking sea views and spacious living areas, this property is perfect for those looking to embrace Mediterranean living at its finest.

The apartment features:

3 spacious bedrooms and 3 modern bathrooms, providing ample space and privacy for residents.
A generous terrace that extends the living space outdoors, ideal for dining, lounging, and enjoying the spectacular views of the bay.
Unfurnished – allowing you to personalize the space and make it your own.
Located on the top floor, offering maximum privacy and unparalleled panoramic views of the Mediterranean Sea.
The property is just a short walk from the vibrant Port Adriano, known for its upscale marina, restaurants, and boutiques. Whether you're looking for a peaceful retreat or a stylish base to enjoy the island, this apartment offers the perfect combination of luxury, comfort, and location.
specifications: Cocina equipada y casa sin amueblar
